entry.title: Hello World
entry.content:
Welcome to Hexo! This is your veryfirst post. Check documentation formore info. If you get any problems when using Hexo, you can find theanswer in troubleshooting oryou can ask me on GitHub.

Quick Start

Create a new post

#include<bits/stdc++.h>using namespace std;#define ll long longint main() {    int n,m;    cin >> n >> m;    vector<ll> sign(n);    for(int i=0;i<n;i++){        cin >> sign[i];    }    unordered_map<ll, int> stu;    for(int i=0;i<m;i++){        ll id;        cin >> id;        stu[id]++;    }    vector<ll> out;    for(auto id : sign){        if(stu[id]%2==0){            out.push_back(id);        }    }    sort(out.begin(),out.end());    cout << out.size() << endl;    for(int i=0;i<out.size();i++){        cout << out[i] << " ";    }    return 0;}

More info: Writing

Run server

$ hexo server

More info: Server

Generate static files

$ hexo generate

More info: Generating

Deploy to remote sites

$ hexo deploy

More info: Deployment

$\int_{-\infty}^{\infty} e^{-x^2} dx =\sqrt{\pi}$
